page.title: 01INTRO TO LANGENHOE
page.content: Our block is a rural agricultural area,including part of the village of {Abberton}and{Langenhoe. { {Langenhoe}is four miles from {Colchester.}Some people work in the village but most work in{Colchester. For the people who have not got a car a half hourly bus service goes into {Colchester.}There are a few street lights along the main road but they are not very noticeable. There is a school for children from four to eleven in the village but after eleven years children have to go to a {Colchester}secondary school. The nearest doctor is in a nearby village. There is a village shop.
